pages.text: Only basic blocks are breakable without tools.$(br)The most important starting resource to find is gravel, because in gravel you can find flint.$(br)Gravel can most commonly be found in certain stony and gravelly biomes, near naturally occuring stone, in caves, along beaches, and beside and under rivers and oceans.

Gravel is one block you can mine with your hands to find flint.  If you are having trouble finding flint, remember, you can craft 4 blocks of mined gravel into one peice of flint without a crafting table.
